faq.question: How long does it take for my puchase to get to me?
faq.answer: Within the United States accessory only will arrive in 3 - 5 days. Any purchase with a bike will take 5 - 7 days to arrive

faq.question: Do I need a mechanic to assembly my bike?
faq.answer: No! If you know how to turn an allen key and a wrench you can assemble you bike yourself. The bike is 80% built upon arrival

faq.question: What is your return policy?
faq.answer: We are confident you will love your ride. We give customers 90 days to return their ride if they don't like it for any reason

faq.question: Where is your shipping warehouse based?
Do you sell new bikes?
faq.answer: No, we buy , fix up and resell bikes to you. This allows us to sell good products for cheaper prices
